text:
Hey, I’m the person behind NayMish.

I’m not here to teach from a distance. I’m still learning. This blog is my notebook of thoughts, experiences, mistakes, lessons, and ideas I'm exploring.

Growth, for me, doesn’t happen in big dramatic ways. It happens quietly — while staying consistent even when things are hard.

Here, I share what I’m learning, what I’m struggling with, and the slow progress I make.

Welcome to NayMish.
